SCN FBMWRingSparkBoltSCRIPT

; Applied to the Sparkbolt Ring.

Begin OnEquip Player
	Player.AddSpell fbmwSparkBoltSpell
	SelectPlayerSpell fbmwSparkBoltSpell
End


Begin OnUnequip Player
	Player.RemoveSpell fbmwSparkBoltSpell
End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 225 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
